law.catch_line: With the approval of the Governor, the Secretary may create advisory units....

text.section: With the approval of the Governor, the Secretary may create advisory units.

section.section: Each advisory unit created under this section shall include at least 1 consumer member.
Each consumer member of an advisory unit created under this section shall be a member of the general public.
A consumer member of an advisory unit created under this section may not be required to meet the qualifications for the professional members of the unit.
